description:
## Objective
The objective is to align the button properly in the title of the loan products page.

### Description

#### Actual Behaviour:
The `padding` of the `edit` button is not been maintained well.  

#### Expected Behaviour:
The `edit` button should be aligned properly.

#### How to Submit
Submit a pull request linking to the issue and include the link to the pull request in your submission through the GCI Portal.

## How to get help 
If you need help, be sure to post your question to our [developer mailing list](http://mifos.org/resources/community/communications/#mailing-lists) or ask in our [chatroom](https://gitter.im/openMF/community-app).
name: Mifos X Community App - Bug Fix: Edit button not aligned properly
